content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: SVPRESP
      operator: equal_to
      value: Y
    - name: VISIT
      operator: is_not_contained_by
      value: $tv_visit
Core:
  Id: CORE-000036
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when SVPRESP is "Y" and VISIT is not present in TV.VISIT.
Operations:
  - domain: TV
    id: $tv_visit
    name: VISIT
    operator: distinct
Outcome:
  Message: Planned visit is not found in TV.
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0657
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Value is "Y" for planned visits, null for unplanned
                  visits.
                Document: SDTMIG v3.4
                Item: SVPRESP
                Section: '5.5'
              - Cited Guidance: The values of VISITNUM in the TV dataset are the valid
                  values of VISITNUM for planned Visits.  Any values of VISITNUM that
                  appear in subject-level datasets that are not in the TV dataset
                  are assumed to correspond to unplanned Visits....  If a subject-level
                  dataset includes both VISITNUM and VISIT, then records that include
                  values of VISITNUM that appear in the TV dataset should also include
                  the corresponding values of VISIT from the TV dataset.
                Document: SDTMIG v3.4
                Item: Assumption 6
                Section: 7.3.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - SV

json.Description: Raise an error when SVPRESP is "Y" and VISIT is not present in TV.VISIT.

Outcome.Message: Planned visit is not found in TV.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Value is "Y" for planned visits, null for unplanned visits.

The values of VISITNUM in the TV dataset are the valid values of VISITNUM for planned Visits.  Any values of VISITNUM that appear in subject-level datasets that are not in the TV dataset are assumed to correspond to unplanned Visits....  If a subject-level dataset includes both VISITNUM and VISIT, then records that include values of VISITNUM that appear in the TV dataset should also include the corresponding values of VISIT from the TV dataset.
